newsitem.title: USA: Newpark Resources to buy barite milling co.
newsitem.headline: Newpark Resources to buy barite milling co.

text.p: Newpark Resources Inc said Tuesday it entered into an agreement to acquire the privately-held Excalibar Minerals Inc in exchange for 166,667 shares of Newpark common stock.
The transaction, which is valued at about $7.5 million and is expected to be accounted for as a pooling of interests, should close by the end of May, a news release issued by Newpark said.
Excalibar Minerals is a specialty milling company, grinding barite and other industrial minerals at facilities in Houston and New Iberia, La., for oilfield and industrial markets.
Excalibar will continue to provide wholesale barite and other industrial minerals to the Gulf Coast drilling fluids market, Newpark said.
Newpark Resources provides integrated environmental and oilfield services to the exploration and production industry.
